channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- candlepin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- candlepin

item.title: CVE-2019-3891|2024-08-04T19:19:18.817Z -- red%20hat -- candlepin
item.description: It was discovered that a world-readable log file belonging to Candlepin component of Red Hat Satellite 6.4 leaked the credentials of the Candlepin database. A malicious user with local access to a Satellite host can use those credentials to modify the database and prevent Satellite from fetching package updates, thus preventing all Satellite hosts from accessing those updates.
